earlyblightalternariasolani.details: Early Blight is caused by a fungus, Alternaria Solani, which over-winters in the soil and infected plants.
earlyblightalternariasolani.title: Disease - Early blight

lateblightphytophthorainfestans.details: Late Blight is caused by a fungus, Phytophthora Infestans, which also affects potatoes.
lateblightphytophthorainfestans.title: Disease - Late Blight

phytophthora blight.details: Late Blight is caused by a fungus, Phytophthora Infestans, which also affects potatoes.
phytophthora blight.title: Disease - Phytophthora Blight

septoria leaf spot tomato.details: Septoria leaf spot is caused by a fungus, Septoria Lycopersici.
septoria leaf spot tomato.title: Septoria Leaf Spot

southern blight.details: Southern Blight is caused by the soil borne fungus Sclerotium Rolfsii
southern blight.title: Disease - Southern Blight

tomato leaves.details: This is a healthy Tomato plant
tomato leaves.title: Healthy Tomato

fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato.details: Fusarium wilt is a disease caused by a fungus, Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. Lycopersici, which lives in the soil.
fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato.recomendations: There is no chemical treatment available. Destroy infected plants immediately. Keep soil pH between 6.5 and 7.0 and use a nitrate-based nitrogen fertilizer.
fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato.chemical: There is no chemical treatment available. Destroy infected plants immediately. Keep soil pH between 6.5 and 7.0 and use a nitrate-based nitrogen fertilizer.
fusarium wilt tomato fusarium tomato.title: Fusarium Wilt Tomato

caterpillardamageeggplant.details: Caterpillar damage that strips the foliage from eggplants, which interferes with proper growth.
caterpillardamageeggplant.recomendations: Spinosad - It is used to control a wide variety of pests. These include thrips, leafminers, spider mites, mosquitoes, ants, fruit flies and others.
caterpillardamageeggplant.title: Caterpillar damage - Eggplant

eggplant leaves.details: This is a healthy Brinjal plant
eggplant leaves.title: Healthy Brinjal

mosaic virus tomato.details: There is no cure for tomato mosaic virus. Once a plant is infected, it stays that way, and the virus can easily be transmitted to other plants.
mosaic virus tomato.recomendations: No chemical products are available to cure or protect plants.
mosaic virus tomato.chemical: No chemical products are available to cure or protect plants
mosaic virus tomato.title: Mosaic Virus Tomato
